original_text: They set the altar in its place, for fear was on them because of the peoples of the lands, and they offered burnt offerings on it to the Lord, burnt offerings morning and evening.
korean_text: 무리가 모든 나라 백성을 두려워하여 제단을 그 터에 세우고 그 위에서 아침 저녁으로 여호와께 번제를 드리며

sentences.original_text: They set the altar in its place
because of the peoples of the lands
and they offered burnt offerings on it to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그 위에서 주께 번제를 드렸다.
